text: læa hakwa khea hela nan di ta rng wi sung xat-tea rxt læa xal-xin yil læa sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ phwk khea cak phracea khxng phwk khea læw nænxn phwk khea kdi briphokh pi læw thima cak beuxngbn khxng phwk khea læa thima cak phay tıthea khxng phwk khea nı hmu phwk khea nan mi klum hnung thi mi khwam yutithrrm læa makmay nı hmu phwk khea nan chang lew ray cring «sing thi phwk khea kratha kan
